About

A quick view of the work I’ve done and where I studied.

Previously

  • CSM.ai — Lead Backend Developer (Remote, Nov 2024 - Jan 2026). Led backend hardening and scale-up, built dynamic workflow architecture, and supported the acquisition by Google DeepMind.
  • Unscript.ai — Senior Backend Developer (Nov 2023 - Nov 2024). Led full-stack delivery on serverless, real-time tracking, and Shopify platforms.
  • Unibuddy — Senior Backend Developer (Aug 2021 - Nov 2023). Built Fargate + Kafka services and migrated millions of users safely.
  • HaikuJAM — Backend Developer (Jul 2019 - Aug 2021). Shipped B2C growth features and an AI creativity product.

Education

BITS Pilani, Goa · 2014 - 2018
